title: SEO Consultant (Shopify & AI Search Specialist)
description:
Company: First Drop Wines (Barossa Valley, Australia)

Location: Remote (Philippines ) 

Part-Time / Contract (with potential for Full-Time)



We don‚Äôt do "stuffy." Based in the Barossa Valley at our "Home of the Brave" cellar door, First Drop Wines is about kick-arse booze, big flavors, and even bigger personality. We make world-class wines (Mother's Milk, The Matador, Fat of the Land) and we need our digital presence to be just as bold as our labels.



The Mission;

We are looking for an SEO Consultant who lives in 2026‚Äînot 2018. Your goal is to get First Drop into the Top 3 on Google by mastering the shift toward AI-driven search (SGE/Gemini), technical Shopify performance, and high-authority "Entity" branding.



Key Responsibilities

 * Technical Shopify SEO: Solve the "Collection vs Product" URL issues, optimize site speed (Core Web Vitals), and ensure our mobile checkout is flawless.

 * Entity & E-E-A-T Building: Implement advanced JSON-LD Schema to link our Winemaker (John Retsas) and our Barossa terroir to the global search graph.

  * AI Search Optimization (GEO/AEO): Optimize our "Journal" and product pages to be the #1 cited source in AI-generated search summaries

* Visual Search Dominance: Manage and optimize video schema for our tasting clips to capture "Video Snippet" real estate.

 * Backlink Strategy: Execute high-quality outreach to wine critics, luxury lifestyle blogs, and regional tourism bodies.



Required Skills

 * Shopify Expert: You know Shopify Liquid code and how to optimize it without relying on heavy plugins.

 * Advanced Schema Master: You can write custom JSON-LD for Products, Videos, and People.

 * Strategic Writer: You can write in a voice that is cheeky, fun, and sophisticated (no generic AI-sounding text).

 * Data Driven: Proficient in GA4, Google Search Console, and Ahrefs/Semrush.

 * Time Zone Sync: Ability to have at least a 3-hour overlap with Australian Central Daylight Time (ACDT).

title: Content Feedback Manager (Giving Feedback): $1,000‚Äì$1,200 USD START RATE
description:

ABOUT US







Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.



BENEFITS

- Full-time position: 8 hours daily, Monday-Friday; 40 hours a week

- Flexible schedule: Choose your own hours, as long as you show up for the daily meeting (MANDATORY)

- Stable income: Long-term role with regular, on-time payments

- Supportive team: Collaborative environment without micromanagement

- Growth path: Opportunities to increase responsibilities and earnings

- 100% remote: Work-from-home setup



TASKS

eting (mandatory, 3pm CET)

HOW TO APPLY

#1: Your CV.

Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.



P.S. While recruitment is handled by Young Publisher, successful candidates will be paid under Social Influence Consulting LLC. This ensures clarity in your employment and payment process.

- Review 30-60 short-form client videos (Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts) per day in our Slack feedback channel -before they are published

- Give constructive, actionable feedback on hooks (verbal/headline/visual), scripting, pacing, editing, and CTA, making sure each client knows exactly how to improve

- Cross-reference each piece of content with client niche, experience, and goals as outlined in their files

- Review previous feedback to ensure consistency and avoid contradictions

- Quality-control content ideas created by our Content Research Experts before delivery to the client, ensuring fit with niche, experience, and likely performance

- Oversee workload balance among Content Research Experts and make sure no one on the team is overloaded or underutilized

- Respond to client questions or tech issues in Slack within 24 hours

- Be tough but fair‚Äîonly approve content that meets quality standards



Progress Tracking



- Complete daily End-of-Day (EOD) reports

- Attend daily tea
eting (mandatory, 3pm CET)

- Keep internal feedback and client progress records up to date



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)

- C1+ English (written), with perfect grammar and clear, professional responses

- Significant experience creating or reviewing short-form content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, or YouTube Shorts

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet, professional home workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment

- Long-term commitment, eager to master a workflow and have direct impact on client success



IMPORTANT



- When recording a Loom video as part of your application:

- Camera must show your FACE & SCREEN

- Treat it as a LIVE interview with the Hiring Manager

- Have a professional background

- Have clear audio

- Wear business-casual attire



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)



- Experience supporting creators and social media beginners, especially ages 45+

- Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT, CapCut, etc.

- Strong understanding of trends/strategy for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $800 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,000‚Äì$1,200 a month once trained)

Note: Senior CFMs earn $1,500+ after 6‚Äì12 months.

- Performance bonuses: Up to $400+ additional monthly based on:

- Quality and clarity of feedback

- Task completion and consistency

- Teamwork and responsibility

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise, direct to your bank

- Tools access: All tools/software fully covered

- Work-life balance: No graveyard shifts

- Professional growth: Frequent feedback and advanced training



HOW TO APPLY



1: Message us on OnlineJobs.ph with "CFM" as the message title



2: Include ONLY the following in your message:



#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#3: Your years of experience with content feedback or coaching.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio (including examples of your feedback or video/content work).



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.



P.S. While recruitment is handled by Young Publisher, successful candidates will be paid under Social Influence Consulting LLC. This ensures clarity in your employment and payment process.

title: Google Ads Strategist
description:
We are looking for a sharp, data-driven PPC Strategist to join our team and drive the success of our Google Ads campaigns. You will specialize in lead generation for high-end boutique fitness and wellness clients.



If you are analytical, meticulous, and thrive on turning data into measurable results, this role is for you.



Role Details:

Location: Remote

Schedule Preference: PT/MT hours (Pacific Time / Mountain Time) on weekdays, plus light part-time weekend availability for monitoring.



About the Job:

You will take full ownership of campaign performance. Your main goal is to improve lead quality, lower cost-per-lead (CPL), and increase return on ad spend (ROAS).



- Strategy & Execution: You will design optimization plans, build clear testing roadmaps, and translate your strategy into execution briefs for our backend automation VAs and media buyers.

 - Data & Insights: You will be the performance storyteller, providing crucial data diagnostics, reports, and clear next-step recommendations to our Account Managers.



What You'll Be Doing:



- Evaluate performance and create optimization plans to improve CPL, lead quality, and ROAS.

 - Make precise strategic adjustments to bids, budgets, keywords, audiences, and ad copy.

- Build structured testing roadmaps (ad variations, bidding strategies, landing page flow) with defined success criteria.

- Brief VAs/media buyers on execution details and review their work to ensure accuracy and impact.

- Partner with Account Managers to analyze data, craft clear performance reports, and present recommendations.

- Create weekly reports with key diagnostics, learnings, and action items tied to client KPIs.

- Validate data accuracy across conversion tracking (Google Tag Manager, GA4, Conversion Actions).

- Maintain standardized SOPs, naming conventions, and campaign documentation.

- Proactively monitor Google Ads and industry trends for new testing ideas.

- Communicate proactively, meet deadlines, and provide light weekend monitoring support.



What You'll Need to Bring:

- Proven experience optimizing Google Ads lead-generation campaigns (Search, Display, YouTube, and/or Performance Max).

- Strong ability to improve CPL and lead quality through structured optimization and testing.

- Deep understanding of key metrics: CTR, CVR, CPL, CPA, Quality Score, and ROAS.

- Google Ads Certification (Search or equivalent) is required.

- High attention to detail; able to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.

- Experience successfully working with VAs or remote media buyers.

- Availability during PT/MT hours with part-time weekend support as needed.



Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)

- Experience providing support or updates to Account Managers or clients.

- Familiarity with A/B testing, Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), and landing page best practices.

- Working knowledge of Google Sheets, Looker Studio, and project management tools.

- Basic understanding of automation tools (Zapier, Make, or similar).

- Exposure to scripts, rules, or automated bidding strategies in Google Ads.



Compensation & Application:

- Compensation: Competitive monthly rate based on your experience and certifications.

- Growth: Opportunities for advancement, training, and a long-term contract with a U.S.-based marketing team.



Ready to Apply?



We are only reviewing applications submitted through our website. Please fill out our application here: 
/hiring-application/

title: Commercial Operations Manager (Healthcare & Infrastructure Systems)
description:
About Us



We are building a structured platform focused on engineered health, safety, and continuity systems serving hospitals, assisted living facilities, industrial sites, and home environments.



Our offerings include:

‚Ä¢ Environmental hygiene and air control systems

Required

 outreach

description:
G'day from Sydney!



We are an advertising company, working with the Philippines for 12 years! And we are looking to add one long-ter
mber to our core team.



The role involves working in a small accounts team of three, and liaising daily with Australian core team. Tasks include entering a high number of bills and transactions into accounting software, creating client invoices and booking forms, financial reporting, matching transactions, calculating payroll, and other financial and admin tasks. This role is exclusive, meaning if you work with our company, you cannot work elsewhere.



You MUST have worked for a single employer for a minimum of 2 years, in any role.





YOU WILL LEARN

- Australian bookkeeping standards

- Australian Tax essentials

- Australian employment structures

- How to calculate Australian Payroll

- The fundamentals of Australian Workplace Culture





WHAT TO EXPECT

- Contractor, not an employee

- Remote / Work from Home

- Work with a long-term Australian and Filipino team.

- Hours are 6:30am - 3:30pm PST, Monday to Friday with a 1 hour lunch each day.

- PHP22000 per calendar month, paid fortnightly (PHP10154 per fortnight).

- Up to PHP25000 per calendar month if you have existing Australian bookkeeping history.

- Payment in PHP through Wise (not AUD or USD).

- Pay review at 3 months and 12 months

- Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly and Monthly responsibilities, including reporting.





To Apply - REQUIRED

- Apply through Online Jobs, quoting reference A2026.

- Tell us a little about yourself. With most recent first, list your last three jobs with one line per job, including name of company, role title, number of months, and typical hours worked per week (eg, ZYX Corp, Bookkeeper, 36 months, 28 hours per week). 



- Attach your CV and tell us why this role appeals to you.

- And, outside of family, tell us about two people you aspire to, and why.

title: Amazon Compliance Specialist
description:
Conduct in-depth research on FDA, EPA, FTC, and other relevant federal and state regulations.

Ensure compliance with international product safety standards (EU, UK, Canada, Asia-Pacific) when applicable.

Perform ongoing monitoring of regulatory updates and interpret implications for product categories.

Support intellectual property due diligence to prevent patent, copyright, or trademark infringement.



Risk Management & Product Compliance



Evaluate new and existing products for compliance risks and advise stakeholders on mitigation strategies.

Develop compliance testing protocols and coordinate with third-party labs and certification agencies.

Manage corrective actions, recalls, or withdrawals in alignment with Amazon‚Äôs policies and legal requirements.

Conduct audits of product listings and seller submissions to prevent unlawful or restricted product selection.



Cross-Functional Collaboration



Partner with Legal, Product Development, Supply Chain, and Seller Performance teams to execute compliance initiatives.

Provide clear guidance to vendors, suppliers, and internal teams on compliance requirements.

Train cross-functional stakeholders on compliance best practices and emerging regulatory risks.

Act as a subject matter expert to business teams during product launches, regulatory reviews, and inspections.



Policy & Process Development



Draft and implement compliance procedures, standard operating protocols (SOPs), and escalation processes.

Support automation and system-based compliance controls to scale monitoring and enforcement.

Contribute to internal policy development regarding restricted products, product claims, and safety certifications.

Continuously improve workflows to enhance accuracy, timeliness, and audit readiness.



Documentation & Reporting



Maintain accurate records of compliance assessments, approvals, and regulatory correspondence.

Prepare detailed reports and risk assessments for leadership review.

Provide supervisors with regular feedback on task progress, emerging risks, and resolution status.

Ensure confidentiality of sensitive data, supplier information, and Amazon business strategy.





Experience interacting directly with regulators including federal and state agencies

Experience in research and analyzing federal and state regulations

Familiarity and experience in dealing with FDA regulation is REQUIRED

Familiarity with international compliance frameworks (REACH, RoHS, CE marking).

Experience in compliance auditing, regulatory affairs, or legal review.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.

Excellent communication skills for engaging with global teams and regulators.

Ability to handle multiple projects in a fast-paced environment with strict deadline

title: Amazon Brand Manager
description:
Manage daily sales operations for assigned products, including pricing, promotions, and advertising campaigns (PPC required).

Oversee existing product listings and identify new revenue opportunities within respective categories.

Monitor product performance to ensure consistent sales growth and higher product category rankings.

Conduct in-depth product analysis to identify and address performance issues and enhance the customer experience.

Research market trends and competitors to uncover new opportunities and guide strategic decisions.

Collaborate with the inventory planning team to plan and promote excess inventory through effective promotional activities.

Ensure accuracy, timeliness, and confidentiality in all deliverables and data handling.

Provide regular updates and feedback to supervisors on progress, challenges, and opportunities.

Comply with all Company policies, procedures, and quality standards.

Perform other related duties as assigned.





Qualifications



Strong analytical background

Ability to make informed, quick, and calculated decisions based on large amount of data whether launching new products or updating current products

Highly efficient in time and task management

Has an entrepreneurial mind-set

Ability to develop an efficient collaboration system

Experience in conducting deep-dive market research

Excellent English communication skills both written and verbal

Excellent documentation skills

Good leadership skills

Willingness to continually learn on the job by staying on top of the latest strategies and promotional tactics

title: Full-Time Activewear Designer
description:
About Us



We are an Australian premium wellness brand expanding into high-end activewear and lifestyle apparel. Our goal is to create elevated performance pieces that combine functionality, sculpting fit and luxury aesthetics.



We are looking for a talented full-time designer who wants to grow with an international brand and help build something meaningful long-term.



Role Overview



You will be responsible for designing activewear collections from concept through to production-ready tech packs.



This is a long-term position, not a short freelance project.



Responsibilities



Design activewear and athleisure collections



Create detailed production-ready tech packs



Develop garment specifications and measurements



Suggest fabrics suitable for performance wear



Design trims, hardware and branding details



Work with overseas manufacturers to refine samples



Research global trends in activewear and fashion



Requirements



3+ years experience in apparel or activewear design



Strong portfolio (must include activewear)



Advanced Adobe Illustrator skills



Experience building professional tech packs



Understanding of stretch fabrics, fit and garment construction



Detail-oriented and commercially aware



Strong English communication



Nice to Have



Experience working with Chinese manufacturers



Knowledge of luxury or premium athleisure brands



Experience with seamless or compression wear



Salary



Competitive monthly salary based on experience (Full-Time).

Please include your expected monthly salary in USD.



To Apply



Send:



Your portfolio (PDF or link)



3 activewear pieces you designed (with tech pack sample if possible)



A short paragraph on how you would improve a premium activewear brand



Your expected monthly salary



Applications without portfolios will not be reviewed.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
About Us

X-Brands builds and scales brands through smart design, marketing, and innovation. We work with multiple clients to create distinct brand identities, high-performing e-commerce assets, and compelling visual systems.

We‚Äôre growing fast and looking for a Creative Designer who can think strategically about branding, execute clean designs, and confidently use modern tools (including AI) to bring ideas to life.





What You‚Äôll Do



Create and evolve brand identities for multiple clients (logos, color systems, typography, visual language).

Design websites and landing pages from a UI/UX and visual design perspective (layout, hierarchy, components, and flows ‚Äî no coding or development required).

Design Amazon A+ content and storefronts that are visually strong and conversion-focused.

Develop creative assets for ads, social media, and marketing campaigns across different brands.

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, image generators, design assistants) to ideate, iterate, and accelerate creative output‚Äîwhile maintaining quality and originality.

Design packaging and product visuals that stand out both online and on shelves.

(Bonus) Support photo editing, retouching, or light motion/animation when needed.





What We‚Äôre Looking For

Strong Amazon design experience (A+ content, storefronts, e-commerce visuals).

Proven ability to create brand identities, not just individual assets.

Comfortable working across multiple brands and clients with different aesthetics.

Confident using AI/ChatGPT in your creative workflow and able to explain how you use it.

A strong portfolio showing branding, e-commerce, advertising, or packaging work.

Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, and other design tools you rely on.

Detail-oriented, fast, collaborative, and able to handle feedback well.

(Nice to have) Photo editing, motion design, or short-form video experience.





The Process



Submit your portfolio (required).

Shortlisted candidates will complete a short creative test:

Amazon design task

Brand/AI-assisted creative exercise





Why Join Us



Shape multiple brands from the ground up.

Work in an environment that values creative thinking and experimentation.

Use creativity + AI to produce work that actually performs.

See your designs make a real, measurable impact across brands.

title: GA4 & Firebase Analytics Specialist for SaaS App (Advanced Setup + Dashboard Build)
description:
We are looking for an experienced GA4 / Firebase Analytics specialist to audit, optimize, and structure analytics for our live mobile SaaS application.



This is not a basic GA4 install job. The app is already live. We need proper event architecture, conversion tracking, and executive-level dashboards to support growth, retention, and investor reporting.



Scope of Work:



‚Ä¢ Audit current GA4 & Firebase setup as well as the data linked to Google Ads

‚Ä¢ Clean up event naming and tracking structure

‚Ä¢ Ensure user_id implementation is correct

‚Ä¢ Build proper funnel tracking (Install ? Signup ? First Transaction ? Activation ? Paid)

‚Ä¢ Build cohort retention reports (Day 1 / Day 7 / Day 30)

‚Ä¢ Set up trial-to-paid conversion tracking

‚Ä¢ Configure BigQuery export (if recommended)

‚Ä¢ Create a clean executive dashboard showing:

‚Äì Active users

‚Äì Activation rate

‚Äì Feature adoption

‚Äì Trial conversion

‚Äì Retention cohorts

‚Äì Revenue metrics

‚Äì Broad User Data - USER HEALTH, PRODUCT ENGAGEMENT DEPTH, BEHAVIORAL INTELLIGENCE, 



Requirements:



‚Ä¢ Strong experience with GA4 for SaaS

‚Ä¢ Firebase Analytics experience

‚Ä¢ Experience implementing user_id tracking

‚Ä¢ Experience building dashboards in Looker Studio or similar

‚Ä¢ Experience working with subscription apps preferred

‚Ä¢ Must provide examples of dashboards you have built



Deliverables:



‚Ä¢ Clean documented event structure

‚Ä¢ Verified funnel tracking

‚Ä¢ Verified retention tracking

‚Ä¢ One executive dashboard

‚Ä¢ Written documentation explaining how everything works



This is a paid project with potential for ongoing analytics support.



Please respond with:



Examples of GA4 dashboards you‚Äôve built



Description of a SaaS analytics project you completed



Your recommended approach for tracking activation in a subscription app

title: Legal Intake Specialist (Personal Injury Law Firm)
description:
Customer Support Representative (After-Hours & Weekend Coverage)

Location: Remote ‚Äì Philippines

Employment Type: Full-Time, Long-Term



We are hiring a reliable and professional Customer Support Representative to provide live, customer-facing support during our after-hours and weekends (PST).



Work Schedule (Required)

Evening & overnight shifts (after 5:00 PM PST)

Full weekend coverage required

Fixed schedule to be assigned



About the Role

We are a U.S.-based personal injury law firm seeking a reliable, professional Legal Intake Specialist to be the first point of contact for potential clients. This role is phone heavy and client facing. You will speak with people who have been injured in a motor vehicle collision and other claim event and help guide them calmly through the intake process.

This is not a generic VA role. We are looking for someone who communicates clearly, follows structured processes, documents accurately, and can work consistently during U.S. Pacific Time hours.

This is a long-term position with training, structure, and growth opportunities.



Key Responsibilities

Answer inbound phone calls and messages from potential clients

Handle high volume intake calls with empathy and professionalism

Calm distressed callers and guide conversations with clear call control

Collect and document accurate case details in our systems (CRM)

Confirm event details such as date, location, injuries, and next steps

Set expectations and explain what will happen after the call

Follow scripts and procedures while maintaining a natural, human tone

Work closely with the U.S. team during live PST business hours



Required Qualifications

Strong spoken English with a clear, professional phone voice

Experience in one or more of the following:

‚Äì Legal intake

‚Äì Call center or customer support

‚Äì Sales or client success

Comfortable speaking with injured or emotional callers

Strong attention to detail and accurate data entry

Reliable internet connection and quiet work environment

Ability to work the required PST schedule consistently

Preferred (Not Required)

Experience with CRMs or case management systems

Previous legal, medical, or insurance intake experience

Workstation Requirements

Stable high-speed internet

Quiet, private workspace

Quality headset and microphone

Computer capable of handling multiple web-based systems



VOICE SAMPLE REQUIRED (MANDATORY)

Applications without a voice recording will not be reviewed.

You must submit a voice recording link with your application. The link must be accessible immediately (no permission requests).

Voice Recording Requirements

File format: MP3 or M4A

Total length: 60‚Äì120 seconds

Quiet environment, headset preferred

Label your file or link as: LAST NAME _First name _Intake Voice

Your voice recording must include TWO short clips:

Clip A ‚Äì Self Introduction (25‚Äì40 seconds)

Introduce yourself and briefly explain your background. You may use this as a guide:

‚ÄúHi, my name is [Name]. I‚Äôm applying for the Legal Intake Specialist role. I have experience in customer support, sales, or intake. I‚Äôm comfortable handling phone calls, documenting information accurately, and working with structured processes. In client facing work, I focus on empathy, clarity, and guiding people through next steps.‚Äù

Clip B ‚Äì Short Intake Scenario (45‚Äì75 seconds)

Respond as if you are speaking to a real caller.

Scenario:

A caller says, sounding stressed and upset:

‚ÄúI was just in a motor vehicle crash. My neck hurts and my car is totaled. The other driver ran a red light. I don‚Äôt know what to do. I need a lawyer right now.‚Äù

Record how you would respond in the first minute of the call.

Your response should:

Acknowledge the caller‚Äôs stress or pain

Calm the caller and take polite control of the conversation

Begin gathering basic information conversationally

Confirm whether the caller has received or plans to receive medical treatment

Explain what the next step will be after the call

Do not give legal advice. Focus on intake, information gathering, and next steps only.

How to Apply

Please submit in one message:

1. Your resume (PDF)

2. Your voice recording link

3. Confirmation that you can work on the required PST schedule

We are looking for dependable professionals interested in long term work and growth. Qualified candidates will be contacted for next steps.

title: Social Media and Marketing Manager for a plumbing company
description:

 groups.

About Us

mbers. We run on clear roles, documented processes, and accountability.



How to Apply

No-AI for applications (to filter applicants): Your
, r√©sum√© text, tests, and video script must be written by you without AI, translators, or templates. If we detect AI use, your application will be automatically moved to spam.

 subject line: ‚ÄúI want to work as SMM & MM ‚Äì [Your First Name]‚Äù.

Attach a short introduction video summarizing your experience and why you are the best candidate.

title: Workforce Optimization Coordinator (Remote ‚Äì Part Time)

title: Inbound Sales Closer ‚Äì High-Energy, High-Earning Opportunity
description:
We‚Äôre a fast-growing digital marketing agency, and we‚Äôve built a lead machine that‚Äôs generating 15‚Äì50 warm, inbound leads per day. These aren‚Äôt random prospects - they‚Äôre reaching out to us because they want what we offer. Now, we need a killer closer to jump in and turn interest into revenue.



This is a remote, part-time role with a flexible schedule, paid training, and a real opportunity to make serious money if you know how to work the phones and follow a proven process.



Why This Role Is Different

???? No cold calling ‚Äì all leads are inbound and requesting help.

???? Instant connection tech ‚Äì when a lead comes in, your phone rings, you press a button, and you‚Äôre talking to them immediately.

???? Speed-to-lead = bigger commissions ‚Äì the faster you connect, the higher your close rate.

???? Proven process ‚Äì we‚Äôve built and refined a sales system designed to win. You just need to follow it.



Your Mission

Your #1 job: Close deals.



But it‚Äôs more than that. You‚Äôll:

Jump on inbound calls the second a lead comes in (SPEED = MONEY).

Walk prospects through our short, powerful sales deck.

Showcase exactly how our agency can deliver them qualified leads fast.

Gather key details to personalize proposals (we handle the proposals for you).

Follow up with prospects, keep deals moving through your pipeline, and collect payments.

Bottom line: Your success is measured by closed revenue, not endless outreach.



The Daily Flow

Lead Comes In ? Your Phone Rings

Tap a button. You‚Äôre instantly connected.

Engage Fast.

Follow up on the leads you're unable to reach.

Answer questions, set up a quick demo, or walk them through the pitch right there.



Close or Move Them Forward

If they‚Äôre ready ? close them on the spot.

If they‚Äôre not ready ? move them into the pipeline and let our automated follow-up 
 + SMS) work behind the scenes while you focus on the next lead.



Follow Up Relentlessly

Every lead gets 10 touches in 10 days before you mark them dead.



What We‚Äôre Looking For

Sales experience - preferably in digital marketing, lead gen, or similar high-ticket services.

Strong closer mentality: confident, persistent, and coachable.

Comfortable having business-level conversations with owners, founders, and marketing managers.

Self-driven and highly responsive - especially when leads come in hot.

Excellent communicator on phone, Zoom, Slack, and
.



Why You‚Äôll Love This

???? High-income potential - the better you close, the more you make.

???? 100% remote - work from anywhere.

???? Paid training - we invest in making you a top performer.

???? No hunting, no cold prospecting - we handle the lead generation.

???? Flexible hours - 9:30 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM availability preferred, but we reward performance with freedom.

???? Fun, supportive culture - we‚Äôre laid-back, collaborative, and results-driven.



The Bottom Line

We‚Äôve spent years building a well-oiled inbound sales machine - all we need is the right closer to plug in, follow the playbook, and make serious money.

If you‚Äôre hungry, competitive, and ready to turn hot leads into big commission checks, we want to talk to you.



How to Apply

Send a 10 sec video so we can hear your voice.

Send us your resume and a quick note about why you‚Äôre a perfect fit. We‚Äôre selective - this is a high-visibility, high-impact role - but for the right person, it‚Äôs an opportunity to thrive.

title: Marketing + Social Media Assistant
description:
About the Role



I‚Äôm looking for a marketing generalist who can help us get our mental fitness platform and content in front of the right people‚Äîwhile keeping things authentic, strategic, and a little bit fun. You'll be working across channels 
, LinkedIn, YouTube, and more) to help us grow our audience and serve the people who need evidence-based psychological tools.



This role is perfect for someone who's comfortable wearing multiple hats, moving fast, learning as they go, and genuinely cares about making mental wellness accessible. If you're the kind of marketer who gets excited about testing new AI tools, writing compelling copy, and figuring out what makes people click (literally and metaphorically)‚Äîkeep reading.



What You'll Be Doing



‚Ä¢ Managing
 marketing campaigns in Mailchimp (newsletters, nurture sequences, the works)

‚Ä¢ Creating and scheduling content for LinkedIn and YouTube (posts, Shorts, engagement)

‚Ä¢ Editing video clips from longer content for social media distribution

‚Ä¢ Using AI tools to streamline workflows, generate ideas, and optimize content

‚Ä¢ Writing copy for various channels 
s, social posts, landing pages, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Tracking performance metrics and helping us understand what's working

‚Ä¢ Supporting various non-marketing projects as needed (I have a small team, so flexibility matters)



What I‚Äôm Looking For



Must-Haves:

‚Ä¢ 3+ years of marketing experience (agency, in-house, freelance, or startup environment)

‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with Mailchimp, LinkedIn, and YouTube

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with video editing software (enough to create compelling clips and Shorts)

‚Ä¢ Comfortable with AI tools and willing to experiment with new platforms

‚Ä¢ Genuine interest in mental health, psychology, and wellness

‚Ä¢ Self-starter energy‚Äîyou can work independently and don't need hand-holding

‚Ä¢ Experience growing social media audiences organically



Bonus Points For:

‚Ä¢ Strong copywriting skills (you know how to write for humans, not robots)

‚Ä¢ SEO and content strategy knowledge

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with analytics platforms (Google Analytics, YouTube Analytics, etc.)



About MYNDY



MYNDY is a mental fitness platform that provides evidence-based psychological tools and training‚Äîthink democratized executive coaching. I work with individuals and organizations to help people win the moments that matter, using research-backed methods delivered in an accessible, human way.



Our vibe:

‚Ä¢ Smart but never stuffy

‚Ä¢ Research-backed but genuinely helpful

‚Ä¢ Authentic over polished perfection

‚Ä¢ Collaborative and thoughtful



I‚Äôm building something meaningful here, and I want people on the team who care about the mission as much as the marketing metrics.



Details



‚Ä¢ Part-Time

‚Ä¢ Remote-friendly

‚Ä¢ Room to grow with the company as I scale



If you're someone who gets excited about translating psychology research into content people actually engage with, who loves the challenge of multi-channel marketing, and who wants to help build something that genuinely helps people‚Äîlet's talk.



To Apply



Send us:

1. Your resume or LinkedIn profile

2. A brief note about why this role excites you and what makes you great at marketing

3. 1-2 examples of marketing work you're proud of (campaigns, copy, content‚Äîwhatever showcases your skills)



Looking forward to meeting you!

title: Sales Representative
description:
Join a fast-growing US online home goods retailer and enjoy the learning and opportunities that you have while working with us.



We strive to provide 5-star service & shopping assistance to all of our clients, and all of our team is accountable to fulfill this.



We are looking for a Sales Representative who can assist prospective buyers and close online ecommerce sales.



We're only looking for full-time, long-term, ongoing cooperation.



Work schedules available:

8 AM to 4 PM US EST

4 PM to 12 AM US EST



Your work week will be 5 days per week, with 2 days off per week. Days off will be selected with your manager. We will try to accommodate your preferences for which days you like, based on availability.



This role starts ASAP.



Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Receive incoming phone calls and live chats from potential customers (prospects) who indicated that they need shopping assistance. This does not include calls and chats from existing customers that need help with their orders (that‚Äôs a job for a different department)

Makes follow-up calls, writes follow-up
s, and text messages to potential buyers. We try to follow up 5x with each person that contacted us (unless they indicate that they are no longer interested). We don‚Äôt do cold calling. Only reaching out to prospects who interacted with our online store and left their contact information.

After each interaction with a prospect/customer, writes notes & comments in our CRM (Asana)

Communicate efficiently and build rapport with potential customers

Assists prospects in their shopping journey and helps make the purchase decision

Ensures that all prospects‚Äô questions and objections are addressed

Leads every interaction to a close sale, which means an order is placed on our online store

Prepares custom quotes, price matches competitors if necessary, and offers custom discounts. This requires calculating margins & ensuring profitability.

Answering questions about the products we offer, including technical questions. Learns the specifications, features and benefits of our bestsellers. Over time, becomes an expert in the industry.

If not able to answer product-specific questions, conducts research in the materials provided by the supplier, or reaches out to the supplier to get the information

Confirms stock availability and lead times when offering products to prospects

Documents standard procedures and best practices in a written form, so that other tea
mbers can learn from them



Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in sales on the phone

Experience must include both inbound and outbound sales

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Experience in Customer Service on the phone is a nice to have

Experience in the e-commerce (online shopping) industry is nice to have

Home improvement, construction, and gas plumbing industry experience is a plus

Outgoing, friendly, and lively

Can-do mindset, with a sense of ownership, pride in your performance, and its impact on the company‚Äôs success

Long-term commitment - treat this as your career



What we can offer:

Sales commission: 8% of gross profit from all orders closed. Gross profit means the sale amount minus the product and shipping costs. Paid monthly. No upper limit. Monthly commission payouts range between $1,200 (the guaranteed minimum) and as high as $3,000 (for the top performer). The average monthly payout is $1,465 (average from the last 2 years).

$1,200/month minimum guaranteed pay

15 days paid days off per year (also convertible to min. guaranteed commission)

Paid training on all aspects of the role

Opportunities for professional development

Friendly atmosphere

Online Interview process

Fully remote position

title: Operations/Recruitment Manager - U.S. Residential Cleaning Company
description:
High-Performance Operations & Recruitment Manager ‚Äì Greater Phoenix Cleaning (Residential & Commercial Cleaning): We‚Äôre hiring a high-energy, detail-oriented Operations Manager to act as the CEO‚Äôs right-hand and help scale a fast-growing service business in a major U.S. metro. This leadership-focused role includes coordinating daily operations, assisting with recruiting and hiring, communicating with clients and tea
mbers via phone/SMS/email, negotiating when needed to up-charge clients when conditions differ from booking details or add-ons arise, providing discounts or service recovery solutions when cleaners are late or no-shows, coordinating backup cleaners, resolving access issues throughout the day, supporting creative social media growth, identifying operational gaps, and helping build stronger systems and workflows (AI/automation experience is a strong plus). 



The ideal candidate is highly organized, proactive, resilient under pressure, able to give and receive direction, and looking for long-term professional growth ‚Äî not a passive VA role. Schedule is full-time Monday‚ÄìSaturday (Sundays off) with occasional overtime during busy periods. Competitive pay, bonuses, PTO after proven consistency, and growth opportunities every 6 months for strong performers. Do not apply if you struggle with accountability, organization, or fast-paced environments. To apply, submit a 3-minute Loom video addressed to Ross explaining: (1) your operations or leadership experience, (2) one stressful situation you successfully handled, (3) your favorite AI or systems tool (if any), and (4) why you believe you are the best candidate for this role.



DISC: You should be a High D and High C for this role. Please provide DISC test results (if available).

title: Cybersecurity & IT Specialist
description:
About Us

We are a premium managed IT & cybersecurity provider delivering end-to-end NOC + SOC services to small and mid-sized businesses in the U.S. Our clients rely on us for 24/7 monitoring, vulnerability management, incident response, and policy & governance. We pride ourselves on delivering high-touch, proactive security solutions while leveraging a global support model.



Position Summary

We are looking for a Specialist to join our Security Operations Team. You will work alongside Tier 1 staff to analyze, triage, and remediate cybersecurity and IT incidents for our U.S.-based clients. You will be the first escalation point for complex issues and play a key role in keeping our clients‚Äô networks, endpoints, and systems secure.



Key Responsibilities

Triage and investigate escalated security alerts from endpoints, servers, and network devices

Remediate incidents using remote tools and integrated workflows (Huntress, NinjaOne, PSA)

Conduct vulnerability remediation and patch verification

Document incidents, resolutions, and escalation procedures in PSA/ticketing system

Assist in root cause analysis for recurring issues

Collaborate with Tier 1 analysts and U.S.-based escalation team

Participate in shift-based 24/7 coverage as required



Qualifications

Required:

5+ years experience in IT support or cybersecurity operations

Familiarity with Windows, macOS, and Linux environments

Knowledge of endpoint monitoring, patch management, and vulnerability remediation

Experience with RMM tools (NinjaOne or equivalent) and EDR (Huntress or equivalent)

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills

Excellent written and verbal communication in English

Comfortable working remotely and in a shift-based environment



Preferred:

Familiarity with firewalls, VPNs, and network monitoring

Knowledge of incident response procedures and cybersecurity best practices

IT certifications (CompTIA Security+, Network+, Microsoft, or similar)



What We Offer

Competitive salary + benefits

Remote work with flexible scheduling

Opportunity to work with U.S. clients and premium security stack

Professional development and training in cybersecurity and IT operations

Dynamic, supportive team environment

title: Sales Support Executive
description:
About the company

At Miraco Nutripharm, we are dedicated to advancing health and improving lives. Our goal is to relieve 1 billion people worldwide of pain and discomfort. If you know of anyone who has been worried about or suffered from any health problems, join us in making a positive impact by reducing the pain and distress others have to endure.



Job description

As the Sales Support Executive, you will be responsible for supporting a broad range of commercial tasks within the organisation. This includes/will include customer service, order processing, maintaining sales call sheets and supporting operational workflows through process documentation and improvement as well as research and analysis to achieve business stability and growth. The ideal candidate will have a good understanding of commercial processes and be an agile multi-tasker with strong organisational and problem-solving skills. 



Key Responsibilities:



Commercial Administrative Support

- Assist in researching and compiling information to support various business functions

- Work cross functionally and support management in scheduling, tracking project milestones and monitoring deliverables to ensure business goals are successfully met 

- Provide administrative and operational support as required



Customer Experience

- Onboard new customers, ensuring a smooth transition and successful implementation

- Maintain accurate records of client interactions and progress in ERP & CRM tools

- Monitor customer health scores and proactively address any issues or risks

- Review account performance metrics and sales value regularly to track growth trends and identify opportunities.

- Proactively recommend strategies to strengthen account potential, optimise visibility, and drive incremental sales across channels.

- Maintain and update Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for smooth and stable daily operations across different departments 

- Identify and improve areas to increase operational efficiencies and business workflows to optimise resource utilisation  

- Collaborate with sales, marketing, and support teams to deliver an excellent customer experience

- Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities in coordination with the sales team

- Sales order processing with our ERP system

- Collaborate with Operations and Fulfilment team to ensure timely enquiries handling, order processing and delivery 

- Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with customers

- Analyze customer data and feedback to improve services and retention strategies

- Act as the voice of the customer internally to advocate for their needs and feedback while taking into account business objectives 

- Monitor and manage regional e-commerce platforms (e.g., Shopee, Lazada) to ensure product listings are accurate, - compliant, and authorised.

- Implement seamless and impactful customer journeys across our multi-store eCommerce website (B2C & B2B), CRM loyalty programs and official marketplace store (Shopee & Lazada)

- Optimize customer interactions across touchpoints to increase satisfaction, loyalty and lifetime value, while collaborating closely with digital & marketing, sales and IT teams.



Requirements:

- Bachelor‚Äôs Degree or equivalent qualification

- Computer literacy with knowledge of Google Drive and MS Office applications

- Minimum 2 years of remote work experience

- Experience working with ERP & CRM systems is a bonus

- Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment 

- Strong attention to detail, problem-solving and communication skills

- Effective time management and organisational skills while being adaptable and proactive to initiate process changes

- High levels of integrity and professionalism



Please submit your resume to

title: Creative Strategist & Content Producer
description:
About the company

At Miraco Nutripharm, we are dedicated to advancing health & improving lives. Our goal is to relieve 1 billion people worldwide of pain & discomfort. If you know of anyone who has been worried about or suffered from any health problems, join us in making a positive impact by reducing the pain & distress others have to endure.

Job description

We're looking for a Creative Strategist & Content Producer to shape how our health & pharmaceutical brands communicate across both digital & offline channels. You'll craft effective strategies that translate scientific credibility into compelling storytelling & creative assets - helping us engage our diverse audience as we expand our presence regionally. 



The Creative Strategist & Content Producer will be the visionary link between our brand identity, compelling content creation & drive measurable performance across all key channels. This role is responsible for developing & testing high-impact creative strategies as well as producing content assets (visual, video, copy) internally, specifically designed to drive traffic, increase conversion rates, lower Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) & drive overall revenue growth for our Shopify, Shopee & Lazada stores via social media as well as paid advertising platforms.



You'll work across multiple channels & markets to plan, create & optimize content that builds awareness, strengthens partnerships & supports the new channels of the business. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys balancing creativity, analytics & brand strategy in the health supplement industry. 



Key Responsibilities:

Creative Strategy

- Platform & Channel Strategy: Craft tailored creative strategies for B2C & B2B audiences optimized for platform-specific best practices & formats that align with brand goals & regulatory requirements in each market (e.g., Meta carousel ads, vertical video for TikTok/Reels, static product carousels for Shopee/Lazada e-commerce banner ads).

- Hypothesis Generation & A/B Testing: Develop robust creative testing matrices, formulate clear hypotheses for creative elements (hooks, calls-to-action, visual styles, copy length) that drive measurable improvements in Click-Through Rate (CTR) & Conversion Rate (CVR).

- Audience Segmentation: Translate target audience data & segmentation provided by media buyers into resonant creative themes, ensuring content speaks directly to different stages of the marketing funnel (awareness, consideration, conversion).

- Competitive Analysis: Continuously keep up to date with competitors & industry trends, identifying new & successful creative formats, hooks & messaging to finetune our strategy.

In-House Content Production & Execution 

- Performance Creative Development: Lead the end-to-end creative concept development & production for all organic & paid media campaigns (Meta, TikTok, Google/YouTube, etc.) that align with brand & campaign goals, focusing on high-volume, quick-turnaround testing required for performance marketing.

- Hands-on Asset Creation: Directly produce & edit native social content & performance ads using existing assets, stock libraries & internal resources. This includes:

i. Plan platform-specific content calendars: Cover educational, promotional & corporate communications

ii. Static/Image Editing: Adapt product photography, create ad variations & design simple graphics & banner ads

iii. Video Editing: Fast-paced assembly, cutting, adding text overlays, music & effects for short-form, vertical video (UGC-style, product demos, testimonials)

- Copywriting: Develop high-converting ad copy, landing page headlines & social media captions that align with the creative strategy & brand voice, with a focus on clear value propositions & strong CTAs.

- Asset Management: Ensure all campaign assets are correctly tagged, archived & deployed across relevant channels (Shopify, Shopee, Lazada store fronts & advertising platforms).

- Testing & Optimization: apply insights & analytics to refine & optimize content effectiveness across platforms.

Performance & Reporting

- Data-Driven Insights: Work closely with the Marketing Manager to analyze creative performance reports, identifying which creative variables are driving results (or failing) across Shopify, Shopee & Lazada traffic.

- Iteration & Optimization: 

i. Develop, adapt or review content & formats to improve engagement & performance

ii. Use performance data (ROAS, CPA, CTR, CVR) to rapidly iterate on existing creative assets & inform future strategy, ensuring a continuous cycle of improvement & optimization

Storefront Integration: Integrate winning creative messages & visuals onto the respective e-commerce storefronts (product pages, banners) to ensure a cohesive customer journey.

Multi-Channel Storytelling

- Content cohesion: Ensure content is aligned where possible across digital & print media, including LinkedIn, Instagram,
, YouTube, e-commerce platforms, brochures & trade materials.

- Tailor content: To achieve relevance & effectiveness across different stages of the audience journey ‚Äî from brand awareness & education to conversion.

- Storytelling & visual consistency: To strengthen brand trust & recognition.

Compliance & Brand Integrity

- Uphold regulatory & ethical communication standards across all marketing activities.

- Ensure all content complies with regulatory guidelines & marketing requirements in each country we operate in, including product claims, advertising language & digital promotions.

- Maintain brand credibility by ensuring all communications are factual & aligned with company values.

- Collaborate with internal teams to review materials for accuracy, effectiveness & compliance before publication.



Requirements:

- 3‚Äì5 years of experience in creative strategy, content creation, social media, or brand marketing ‚Äî ideally in health supplements, healthcare or wellness.

- Strong understanding of social media trends & platform best practices (Meta (FB/IG), LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube, Google, Generative AI).

- Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro), CapCut, Canva, Figma, or similar tools.

- Excellent writing, editing & visual storytelling skills ‚Äî adopt a strategic approach to design that integrates marketing & commercial goals.

- Excellent communication, project management & cross-functional collaboration skills.

- Familiarity with regulatory communication standards or track record in health supplements or healthcare industry is a plus.



Please send your applications to

description:
About the Role



I run a growing flooring business in Tampa, Florida selling luxury vinyl plank flooring through
 Ads and
 Marketplace.



We are actively running paid ads and need a skilled assistant who can IMPROVE ad performance, targeting, and lead quality ‚Äî not just post content.



This role is focused on lead generation ads for a local service/product business, not e-commerce.



?



Your Main Objective



Lower cost per lead and increase qualified local inquiries (homeowners + contractors).



?

1.
 Ads Management (Primary Task)

 ‚Ä¢ Monitor and optimize
 ad campaigns

?

?

?

?



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE (Do Not Apply Without This)

 Ads Manager (Meta Ads)

?

 Marketplace marketing

?

?

$5‚Äì$9/hour depending on experience + performance bonuses

title: GemPages Expert Needed ‚Äì Rebuild High-Converting D2C Funnels on Shopify
description:
We run multiple wellness/health D2C brands on Shopify and need a skilled GemPages builder to recreate two types of high-converting landing pages for our funnel. This is an ongoing opportunity for the right person.



What We Need



You will be rebuilding two page types in GemPages based on live reference URLs we provide:



1. Advertorial / Presell Page ‚Äì A long-form editorial-style page designed to look like a health/news article. Includes: headline, author byline, article body with images, inline CTAs, social proof/testimonials, a fake comment section, social sharing buttons, and a clean footer with legal links.



2. Product Landing Page / Sales Page ‚Äì A conversion-optimized product page with: hero section with strong headline + CTA, before/after photo slider, how-it-works section (with video), science/ingredient breakdown, doctor/expert endorsement, comparison icons (USPs), pricing bundles with urgency elements (stock counters, sale badges), FAQ accordion, trust badges, and a sticky CTA or announcement bar.



Requirements

‚Ä¢ Proven experience building pages in GemPages (show examples or portfolio)

‚Ä¢ Pixel-perfect attention to detail ‚Äì pages must closely match the reference URLs

‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of mobile-first, responsive design

‚Ä¢ Experience with direct response / D2C landing pages (not just generic Shopify themes)

‚Ä¢ Ability to work with custom CSS within GemPages where needed

‚Ä¢ Fast turnaround: first page draft within 3‚Äì5 business days

‚Ä¢ Comfortable receiving feedback and iterating quickly

Nice to Have

‚Ä¢ Experience with Shopify Liquid (for minor template tweaks)

‚Ä¢ Understanding of conversion rate optimization (CRO) principles

‚Ä¢ Experience building pages in the health/wellness/beauty niche

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Funnelish, Zipify, or similar funnel tools

Project Details

‚Ä¢ Scope: 2 pages initially (advertorial + product landing page), with potential for 5‚Äì10+ additional pages across multiple brands

‚Ä¢ Budget: Fixed price per page (share your rate), or hourly ‚Äì open to discuss

‚Ä¢ Timeline: First drafts within 1 week

‚Ä¢ Collaboration: We provide all copy, images, and reference URLs. You build and style.



How to Apply

Please include in your proposal:

‚Ä¢ 2‚Äì3 examples of GemPages landing pages or funnels you have built (links preferred)

‚Ä¢ Your estimated rate per page (or hourly rate)

‚Ä¢ Your availability and turnaround time

We are looking for a long-term partner, not a one-off freelancer. If you deliver quality work, there is a consistent pipeline of pages to build across our brand portfolio.

title: AI Video Editor
description:
Are you a fast, detail-oriented video editor who knows how to make AI-generated content look incredibly natural and engaging?



We are looking for a dedicated AI Video Editor to join our team. Your main tool will be HeyGen, and your daily mission will be to produce 10 high-quality, short-form AI avatar videos per day. You won‚Äôt just be clicking "generate" .You will be taking the raw AI output and polishing it in your preferred editing software by adding dynamic captions, B-roll, motion graphics, and sound design to make the final product feel human and ready for social media.



What You Will Do (Responsibilities)



High-Volume Production: Generate and edit 10 short-form videos (TikTok, IG Reels, YouTube Shorts) per day using HeyGen AI avatars and our provided scripts.



Refine & Polish: Clean up any AI artifacts, adjust pacing, fix awkward pauses, and ensure lip-syncing and expressions look as natural as possible.



Post-Production Magic: Add engaging captions, relevant B-roll, sound effects, background music, and smooth transitions to maximize viewer retention.



Workflow Management: Maintain a highly organized file system and consistently meet daily delivery deadlines.



Brand Consistency: Ensure all videos strictly align with our brand guidelines, colors, and visual style.



Who You Are (Requirements)



Proven Experience: Strong portfolio showcasing short-form video editing (preferably for TikTok/Reels/Shorts).



Tech Stack: Experience using HeyGen (or similar AI tools like Synthesia) AND proficiency in professional editing software (CapCut PC, Premiere Pro, or DaVinci Resolve).



Speed & Efficiency: You have a streamlined workflow that allows you to comfortably handle 10 videos a day without sacrificing quality.



Attention to Detail: You have a sharp eye for catching unnatural AI movements and audio-video syncing issues.



Tech Requirements: A fast, reliable computer and a strong, stable internet connection (minimum 25-50 Mbps) to handle heavy video rendering and uploading.



Language: Excellent written and spoken English.





How to Apply

Attention to detail is critical for this role. To prove you have read this entire job description, please include the word "AVATAR" in the subject line of your application message.



In your application, please include:



Your updated resume.



A link to your portfolio (please specifically point out any short-form content or AI-generated videos you have edited).



A brief, 2-3 sentence explanation of your current editing workflow and how you plan to efficiently tackle 10 HeyGen videos a day.

title: Technical Virtual Assistant ‚Äì Digital Asset & Account Manager
description:
Are you highly organized, technically savvy, and experienced in managing multiple social or outreach profiles at scale?



We are looking for a detail-oriented Technical Virtual Assistant to manage our digital assets and account infrastructure. In this role, you will be the backbone of our outreach operations. Your primary responsibility will be setting up, securing, warming up, and organizing a large volume of digital profiles using anti-detect browsers and automation tools. If you love working in spreadsheets, optimizing systems, and handling the technical backend of account management, this role is for you!



What You Will Do (Responsibilities)



Asset Acquisition & Onboarding: Source, procure, and onboard external profile inventory to expand our outreach capabilities.



Security & Credential Management: Immediately update passwords, secure login details, and maintain strict security protocols for all incoming profiles.



Database Management: Build, update, and flawlessly maintain a comprehensive Master Sheet tracking all account details, statuses, and health metrics.



Account Warm-Up: Execute systematic warm-up protocols for all new profiles to build trust and ensure high account health before deployment.



Workspace Navigation: Operate daily within multi-login and anti-detect browser environments, specifically AdsPower and DuoPlus.



Profile Branding & Setup: Customize new accounts by uploading profile images, adjusting banners, and configuring account categories to match our target demographics.



Automation Integration: Connect fully prepared profiles to our backend automation software to prepare them for active campaigns.



Who You Are (Requirements)



Technical Experience: Previous experience working with anti-detect browsers (AdsPower, DuoPlus, or similar) is highly preferred.



Extreme Organization: You love spreadsheets (Google Sheets/Excel) and have a proven track record of managing large sets of data or inventory without making copy-paste errors.



Tech-Savvy: You understand the basics of proxies, cookies, account health, and how to navigate multiple profiles without triggering platform flags.



Problem Solver: You can troubleshoot basic software integration issues when connecting accounts to automation tools.



Reliable Infrastructure: You have a fast, stable internet connection and a PC capable of running multi-login browser profiles smoothly.



How to Apply



In your application, please include:



Your updated resume.



A brief summary of your experience using anti-detect browsers (like AdsPower or DuoPlus) or managing multiple accounts.



A 1-2 sentence explanation of how you typically keep large amounts of data (like login credentials and proxies) organized.

title: Customer Service Manager
description:
We are looking for a highly experienced Customer Service professional who has specifically worked with general fashion dropshipping stores ‚Äî not branded stores.



This is extremely important.



We do not run long-term fashion brands.

We operate general fashion dropshipping stores where:

 ‚Ä¢ We test many different products

 ‚Ä¢ Product quality can vary

 ‚Ä¢ Refund rates must be tightly controlled

 ‚Ä¢ Backend structure determines profitability



Because of this, a strong backend system is everything.



?? Important



If you have NOT worked with general fashion dropshipping stores before ‚Äî especially stores that scale aggressively and deal with refund control, partial refunds, replacements, chargebacks and backend optimisation ‚Äî please do not apply.



This role is not for beginners.



???? Read Carefully



To make sure you‚Äôve fully read this job post, start your application with the word Watermelon.



Applications that do not start with this word will not be reviewed.



???? What We Need



We are not just hiring a customer service agent.



We are looking for someone who can:

 ‚Ä¢ Analyse and optimise refund flows

 ‚Ä¢ Build decision trees for CS agents

 ‚Ä¢ Structure partial refund systems

 ‚Ä¢ Reduce chargeback rates

 ‚Ä¢ Improve backend profitability

 ‚Ä¢ Create scalable SOPs

 ‚Ä¢ Build repeatable systems that can be used across multiple stores



I have personally handled customer service for a long time.

However, I recognise that our systems are not structured enough.



I need someone who can sit down with me and:

 ‚Ä¢ Break everything down from A to Z

 ‚Ä¢ Identify weaknesses

 ‚Ä¢ Build strong backend structures

 ‚Ä¢ Turn chaos into process



???? About Our Stores

 ‚Ä¢ General fashion dropshipping

 ‚Ä¢ Heavy product testing

 ‚Ä¢ Focus on cashflow & profitability

 ‚Ä¢ Backend optimisation > branding



We understand that in this model, refund rates are part of the business.

What matters is control and structure.



???? Who You Are

 ‚Ä¢ Experienced in fashion dropshipping (general stores)

 ‚Ä¢ Understand refund psychology

 ‚Ä¢ Know how to manage partial refunds strategically

 ‚Ä¢ Familiar with chargeback prevention

 ‚Ä¢ Structured thinker

 ‚Ä¢ Data-driven

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable working closely with a founder



???? Final Note



We are not looking for someone to ‚Äúanswer
s.‚Äù



We are looking for someone to help build a scalable backend system for multiple stores.



If this sounds like you, start your message with Watermelon and tell us:

 1. Your experience with general fashion dropshipping stores

 2. Refund % and chargeback % you have worked with

 3. Systems you have built before

 4. Why you think you are a strong fit



Looking forward to hearing from serious candidates only.

title: Short-Form Content Editor and TV Show Fan
description:
I‚Äôm looking for editors who genuinely love TV and know how to turn scenes into a tight, engaging story.

The style is similar to this:





The goal is to take scenes from a show (sometimes across multiple episodes) and cut them into one clean, streamlined 1‚Äì2 minute storyline that feels cohesive and intentional.



No subtitles. No on-screen text. You don‚Äôt need to worry about captions or graphics. Just focus on what matters ‚Äî sharp pacing, smart dialogue trims, and subtle head tracking to keep the frame dynamic.



What I‚Äôm looking for:

Strong instinct for which lines to keep and which to cut

Cutting silences, filler shots, and anything that drags

Restructuring scenes so they flow naturally together

Clean head tracking (Mocha Pro preferred)

Edits that feel immersive, not flashy



I‚Äôll provide:

The show

The direction/theme

Clear notes on the style



This is ongoing work for the right editor. If you naturally watch a scene and think, ‚Äúthis could be way tighter,‚Äù you‚Äôre probably a good fit.



Send:

A few short-form edits you‚Äôve made

The shows you know best

Whether you have Mocha Pro



Looking forward to working with people who actually care about storytelling.

title: Expert Accessibility Specialist (Web + Strong Mobile Expertise | US Standards)
description:
We are seeking an Expert Accessibility Specialist with at least 5+ years of professional experience in web development and accessibility implementation, including strong hands-on mobile application expertise.

Experience Requirements

‚Ä¢ Minimum 5+ years of professional experience in web development

‚Ä¢ Minimum 3+ years implementing accessibility compliance in production environments

‚Ä¢ Proven experience implementing WCAG Level AA and AAA in live systems



US Accessibility Standards

‚Ä¢ Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA)

‚Ä¢ Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act

‚Ä¢ WCAG 2.1 / WCAG 2.2 compliance



Highest Accessibility Level:

? WCAG Level AAA

Minimum requirement: WCAG Level AA compliance



Technical Requirements (Mandatory)

Web Accessibility & Development

‚Ä¢ Strong experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript

‚Ä¢ Experience with React, Angular, or Vue

‚Ä¢ Proper semantic structure and ARIA implementation

‚Ä¢ Keyboard navigation and focus management

‚Ä¢ Experience fixing accessibility issues in production web systems



Strong Mobile Application Expertise (Required)

‚Ä¢ Experience developing mobile applications using Swift or Kotlin

‚Ä¢ Experience with React Native or Flutter (preferred)

‚Ä¢ Implementation of VoiceOver (iOS) and TalkBack (Android)

‚Ä¢ Accessibility labels, traits, content descriptions

‚Ä¢ Focus management and logical navigation

‚Ä¢ Proven experience fixing accessibility issues directly in mobile app source code

Strong mobile accessibility experience is required for this role.



Accessibility Testing Tools

‚Ä¢ Experience using Axe, Lighthouse, WAVE, or similar tools

‚Ä¢ Manual screen reader testing (JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, TalkBack)

‚Ä¢ Keyboard-only testing



Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Conduct full accessibility audits for web and mobile applications

‚Ä¢ Identify ADA and WCAG violations

‚Ä¢ Directly remediate accessibility issues in source code

‚Ä¢ Refactor components to meet WCAG AA or AAA compliance

‚Ä¢ Perform manual and automated accessibility testing

Preferred Qualifications

‚Ä¢ CPACC certification preferred

‚Ä¢ IAAP certification is a plus

‚Ä¢ Experience working with US-based clients

‚Ä¢ Experience preparing VPAT documentation



Important



We are specifically hiring an expert-level programmer who can:

? Audit

? Code

? Fix

? Test

? Deploy

? Ensure compliance independently



If your experience is limited to reporting or documentation only, this role is not suitable.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Executive Assistant / Personal Assistant



Remote | Part-Time



Overview



A New York City-based finance professional and entrepreneur is seeking a highly organized, proactive, and detail-oriented Executive Assistant to manage day-to-day personal and professional tasks. This is a remote, part-time role with the potential to transition to full-time. The right person will become an indispensable extension of the principal‚Äôs daily operations, handling everything from scheduling and personal logistics to early-stage startup support. The responsibilities listed under each category below are illustrative and on an ‚Äúincluding but not limited to‚Äù basis‚Äîthe role will evolve based on the principal‚Äôs needs.



Who You‚Äôll Work With



You will report directly to the principal. He works in institutional finance and is simultaneously launching a real estate services startup. The startup‚Äôs service lines include deal sourcing, analysis and data, transaction processing, rezoning and permitting, and coaching/consulting. He has a demanding schedule and needs someone who can anticipate needs, stay ahead of deadlines, and operate independently with minimal oversight.



Responsibilities



Calendar & Scheduling Management



-   Own and manage the principal‚Äôs personal and work calendars, ensuring they are fully synced and free of conflicts.



-   Schedule recurring personal appointments (e.g., haircuts, grooming) and ensure they are rebooked on a regular cadence.



-   For any personal appointments placed on the work calendar, use discreet, non-descriptive titles that the principal can understand but that do not reveal sensitive details to colleagues.



Personal Logistics & Household Management



-   Coordinate prescription delivery setup and ongoing management for recurring medications.



-   Arrange and oversee service appointments at the principal‚Äôs apartment (e.g., AC installation, maintenance), including coordinating with building management and staff as needed.



-   Handle recurring grocery orders based on a standing list of preferred items, restocking as needed.



-   Manage meal plan subscriptions, including handling any changes, pauses, or issues with delivery services.



Communications & Networking



-   Communicate on the principal‚Äôs behalf with personal friends, family, and professional connections as directed.



-   Facilitate networking efforts, including scheduling introductions, managing contact lists, and following up on connections.



Travel & Bookings



-   Book and manage all personal travel, including flights, hotels, and ground transportation.



-   Proactively flag scheduling conflicts, layover issues, or better routing/pricing options.



Financial & Administrative Oversight



-   Review monthly credit card and bank statements, flagging any unusual, excessive, or unrecognized charges.



-   Maintain a personal budget tracker and provide periodic summaries of spending trends.



Real Estate & Startup Support



-   Assist with the principal‚Äôs ongoing real estate transactions, including coordinating with co-owners, brokers, and legal/brokerage counterparties as directed.



-   Support the real estate services startup across its core service lines: deal sourcing, analysis and data, transaction processing, rezoning and permitting, and coaching/consulting.



-   Conduct real estate deal analysis and financial modeling to support transaction evaluation.



-   Assist with content creation, marketing, and business development for the startup‚Äôs services.



-   Note: Startup responsibilities may grow over time or evolve into a separate dedicated role depending on the candidate‚Äôs interest and capability.



AI Tools & Automation



-   Research, recommend, and set up an AI-powered conversation recording tool that can capture meetings and discussions and automatically generate action items for follow-up.



-   Manage and maintain AI/automation workflows to maximize the principal‚Äôs productivity.



Task & Project Management



-   Maintain a running task list and ensure nothing falls through the cracks. Preferred tools: Asana or a structured weekly progress/next-steps
.



-   Proactively follow up on outstanding items and deadlines without needing to be reminded.



Qualifications



-   2+ years of experience as a virtual or executive assistant, preferably supporting a high-volume professional or entrepreneur.

title: Amazon Catalog & Optimization Specialist (AI-Powered)
description:
About the Role:

We are seeking a high-performing Amazon Catalog Specialist who is as much a data scientist as they are a creative strategist. Your mission is to own the end-to-end health and performance of our Amazon catalog. This is not a simple data-entry job; we need a "Growth Specialist" who leverages AI tools to accelerate our speed to market and maximize listing performance.



Key Responsibilities:



Catalog Management: Full ownership of Amazon Seller Central. You will manage flat files, parent-child variations, and resolve listing suppressions or "stranded" inventory issues with urgency.



Advanced Optimization: Craft high-converting listing copy (Titles, Bullet Points, and Descriptions) using SEO best practices and keyword research tools (e.g., Helium 10, Jungle Scout).



Visual Strategy: Audit and optimize listing visuals. You must understand what makes a "hero image" click and how to structure A+ Content to drive conversions.



AI Integration: Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, or Amazon‚Äôs native AI) to rapidly generate content, conduct sentiment analysis on reviews, and reduce the "time to live" for new listings.



Data Analytics: Regularly analyze ASIN-level data (sessions, CVR, BSR) to identify trends and pivot strategies based on performance metrics.



Customer Support: Manage
-based customer service with professionalism, resolving inquiries in a way that protects our brand reputation and account health.



Required Skills:



Amazon Expert: Proven experience in Seller Central and catalog troubleshooting.



AI-Savvy: Mastery of AI prompting to accelerate research, writing, and performance analysis.



Analytical Mindset: Comfortable working with spreadsheets and interpreting e-commerce data.



Visual Eye: A strong understanding of e-commerce graphic design principles.



Efficiency: A "speed to market" mentality‚Äîyou know how to get things done right, fast.

description:

What You'll Do:

What We're Looking For:

title: [Quick Hire] Remote VA Receptionist Full Time Admin Marketing
description:
